Package projeto_ed.Game

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
projeto_ed.Game.Vertex
public class Vertex extends Object
Represents a vertex in the game graph.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    Vertex()
    Constructs a new Vertex with no associated bot.

  • Method Details

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Checks if the vertex is occupied by a bot.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex is occupied, false otherwise.

    • getBot

      public Bot getBot()
      Gets the bot associated with the vertex.
      Returns:
      The bot associated with the vertex, or null if the vertex is not occupied.

    • setBot

      public void setBot(Bot bot)
      Sets the bot associated with the vertex.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot to be associated with the vertex.

    • getindex

      public int getindex()
      Gets the index of the vertex.
      Returns:
      The index of the vertex.

    • setIndex

      public void setIndex(int index)
      Sets the index of the vertex.
      Parameters:
      index - The index to be set for the vertex.

    • isHasFlag1

      public boolean isHasFlag1()
      Checks if the vertex has Flag 1.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex has Flag 1, false otherwise.

    • setHasFlag1

      public void setHasFlag1(boolean hasFlag1)
      Sets whether the vertex has Flag 1.
      Parameters:
      hasFlag1 - true if the vertex has Flag 1, false otherwise.

    • isHasFlag2

      public boolean isHasFlag2()
      Checks if the vertex has Flag 2.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex has Flag 2, false otherwise.

      Sets whether the vertex has Flag 2.
      Parameters:
      hasFlag2 - true if the vertex has Flag 2, false otherwise.
